title: Taliban issue no-shave order in southern Afghan province: 'No one has a right to complain' | TheHill
content:
1. Taliban issue no-shave order in southern Afghan province: 'No one has a right to complain' | TheHill  The Hill
  2. The Taliban banned barbers from cutting beards in part of Afghanistan, saying it is against Islam  Yahoo! Voices
  3. Afghanistan: Taliban ban Helmand barbers from trimming beards  BBC News
  4. Taliban: Some Restrictions in Provinces Not Official | TOLOnews  TOLOnews
  5. Barbers in Afghanistan's Helmand Province are now prohibited from shaving beards and playing music  CNN
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
